text: Aap keh dijiye kay na to mein tum say yeh kehta hun kay meray pass Allah kay khazaney hain aur na mein ghaib janta hun aur na mein tum say yeh kehta hun kay mein farishta hun. Mein to sirf jo kuch meray pass wahee aati hai uss ka ittabaa kerta hun aap kahiye kay andha aur beena kahin barabar ho sakta hai. So kiya tum ghor nahi kertay
